mapper.update:
update company
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
imgurl = #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companysize = #{companysize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
checked = #{checked,jdbcType=INTEGER},
credit = #{credit,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update company set city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imgurl = #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companysize = #{companysize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, checked = #{checked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, credit = #{credit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
